attributes.action: WE WANT CHARLES BRONSON TO HAVE HIS FREEDOM.
attributes.additional_details:
Bronson was imprisoned for seven years in 1974, aged twenty-two.
He has served his time and needs to be released he is 64 and needs his right to freedom heard.
attributes.background: Gangsters & Crimes now & then Facebook group asks for the release of Charles Arthur "Charlie" Salvador

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the Government or Parliament can do. You could ask the Government to advise the Monarch to exercise the prerogative of mercy.

We can only accept petitions from named individuals, not organisations. You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
